sources.title: The Card (1952)
sources.description: A charming and ambitious young man finds many ways to raise himself through the ranks in business and social standing - some honest, some not quite so. If he can just manage to avoid a certain very predatory woman. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-card-1952/

metadata.Plot: A strangely-garbed and eccentric-acting stranger arrives in a small English town. But, after several days on being in the town, the citizens accept him as a harmless, though a bit daft, member of the community. He then pays a visit to the town's leading citizen and reveals himself as a man with the perfect plan for murder.
metadata.Actors: Alan Badel, Cameron Hall, Geoffrey Bayldon
